sentences.sContent: But, as a former war reporter myself, I recoil from the mawkish sentimentality with which we enshrine our casualties.
sentences.sContent_eng: But, as a former war reporter myself, I recoil from the mawkish sentimentality with which we enshrine our casualties.
sentences.sCn: 然而作为一个前战地记者，我厌恶以这种病态的伤感来铭记我们之中的死者。

synos.tran: 令人作呕的，令人厌恶的；自作多情的；淡而无味的
